Instruction: Slice the pears thinly and place them in a large mixing bowl.
Add arugula and shaved Parmesan cheese to the bowl.
In a small bowl, whisk together the juice of one lemon, olive oil, honey, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.
Pour the dressing over the salad ingredients in the large mixing bowl.
Toss the salad gently to coat the ingredients evenly with the dressing.
Transfer the salad to a serving dish.
Serve the pear and arugula salad immediately as a refreshing and vibrant side dish.
